ERC20Token address, Viridian NFT address, forwarder for gasless, and treasury for royalty payments."},"getBalance()":{"details":"Gets the balance of the exchange contract."},"getListingFromId(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the listing struct from a listing Id."},"getListings()":{"details":"Gets all listing ids that are currently on the exchange."},"getListingsFromUser(address)":{"details":"Gets all listings a user has on the exchange."},"getNftOwner(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the owner of an NFT on the exchange."},"isTokenApproved(address)":{"details":"Returns whether the ERC20 token is supported on the exchange."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pullFromSale(uint256)":{"details":"User can remove one of their listings from the exchange."},"purchaseListing(uint256)":{"details":"Purchase listing for an NFT with an ERC20 token It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"rollbackSales(uint256)":{"details":"Reimburse every address that purcahsed a listing involving the tokenId."},"setRoyalty(uint256)":{"details":"Owner can set a new default royalty value for the exchange."},"setTrustedForwarder(address)":{"details":"Owner can change the trusted forwarder used for gasless."},"setWhitelistRoyalty(uint256)":{"details":"Owner can set a new promotional royalty value for the exchange."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Will support cross-chain purcahsing whether the NFT or listing is on that chain or documentation.text:
Exchange contract that helps facilitate the buying and selling on Viridian NFTs.
 Will support cross-chain purcahsing whether the NFT or listing is on that chain or not.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Token address must not be the 0 address"

arguments.value: Token address must not be the 0 address

documentation.text: @dev Set the default ERC20Token address, Viridian NFT address, forwarder for gasless, and treasury for royalty payments.
@dev Owner can change the trusted forwarder used for gasless.
@dev Replaces msg.sender for gasless support.
@dev Replaces msg.data for gasless support.
@dev Owner can set a new default royalty value for the exchange.
@dev Owner can set a new promotional royalty value for the exchange.
@dev Owner can add support for a new ERC20 token on the exchange.
@dev Owner can remove support for an ERC20 token on the exchange.
@dev Returns whether the ERC20 token is supported on the exchange.
@dev Gets the balance of the exchange contract.
@dev Gets all listing ids that are currently on the exchange.
@dev Gets the listing struct from a listing Id.

documentation.text: @dev Purchase listing for an NFT on a different chain with an ERC20 token payment using stargate.
@dev Reimburse every address that purcahsed a listing involving the tokenId.

Exchange contract that helps facilitate the buying and selling on Viridian NFTs.
 Will support cross-chain purcahsing whether the NFT or listing is on that chain or not.

addERC20Token(address).details: Owner can add support for a new ERC20 token on the exchange.

changeSalePrice(uint256,uint256).details: User can put one of their NFTs up for sale.

constructor.details: Set the default ERC20Token address, Viridian NFT address, forwarder for gasless, and treasury for royalty payments.

getBalance().details: Gets the balance of the exchange contract.

getListingFromId(uint256).details: Gets the listing struct from a listing Id.

getListings().details: Gets all listing ids that are currently on the exchange.

getListingsFromUser(address).details: Gets all listings a user has on the exchange.

getNftOwner(uint256).details: Gets the owner of an NFT on the exchange.

isTokenApproved(address).details: Returns whether the ERC20 token is supported on the exchange.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pullFromSale(uint256).details: User can remove one of their listings from the exchange.

purchaseListing(uint256).details: Purchase listing for an NFT with an ERC20 token payment.

purchaseListingOmniChain(uint256).details: Purchase listing for an NFT on a different chain with an ERC20 token payment using stargate.

putUpForSale(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.details: User can put one of their NFTs up for sale.

removeERC20Token(address).details: Owner can remove support for an ERC20 token on the exchange.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rollbackSales(uint256).details: Reimburse every address that purcahsed a listing involving the tokenId.

setRoyalty(uint256).details: Owner can set a new default royalty value for the exchange.

setTrustedForwarder(address).details: Owner can change the trusted forwarder used for gasless.

setWhitelistRoyalty(uint256).details: Owner can set a new promotional royalty value for the exchange.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: return if the forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions to us. the forwarder is required to verify the sender's signature, and verify the call is not a replay.

userdoc.notice: Exchange contract that helps facilitate the buying and selling on Viridian NFTs. Will support cross-chain purcahsing whether the NFT or listing is on that chain or not.
